title: DevOps Engineer Job at Odixcity Consulting
content:
Odixcity Consulting is an International Hr consulting and procurement firm. With expertise in Recruitment & Selection, Performance management, Training & Development, Compensation and benefits as well as Outsourcing of goods and services for organizations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: DevOps Engineer
Job Location:  Nigeria (Remote)

Job Summary


	We are looking for a dynamic driven DevOps Engineer to join our team.


Role Objective:
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Ensure reliable, fast, and efficient software delivery by enabling continuous integration, continuous delivery (CI/CD), and infrastructure automation.


Responsibilities 


	Maintain system configuration with tools like Chef, puppet, or Ansible.
	Setting up and managing CI/CD pipelines to enable rapid and reliable releases.
	Implement monitoring systems to track application performance and identify potential issues.
	Performing vulnerability scanning, secret management, and compliance checks.
	Automate and optimize repetitive tasks and processes.
	Use tools such as; Terraform, Cloud Formation or Pulumi to manage infrastructure programmatically.
	Manage compute, storage, networking, and security configurations.
	Support incident response and root cause analysis.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a relating field.
	3 - 5 years of experience in DevOps or a similar role.
	Strong Knowledge of Linux/Unix systems.
	Proficiency in CI/CD tools, pipeline management, and automation frameworks.
	Knowledge of monitoring/logging tools.
	Excellent Microsoft power platform, and analytical skills.


Required Skills:


	Proficiency in one or more cloud providers.
	Infrastructure as Code (IaC).
	Configuration management.
	Version control.
	Monitoring and logging.
	Networking and security.
	Problem solving.
	Collaboration and Adaptability.


Salary
N400,000 / Month (non-negotiable).

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobscandidate8@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Head of Internal Audit Job at Changeroom
content:
Change room was established in 2012 with a vision to produce quality human resource solutions. We plan to achieve this by partnering with our clients to provide highly specialized consulting services in the areas of human resources development and business management services. Our partnership approach affords us the opportunity of working with you to find the most efficient and appropriate solutions to meet your short, medium and long-term goals. In partnering with your organization, we make it our business to understand your business, embrace its values, aims and objectives.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head of Internal Audit

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Requirements


	Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Accounting or Finance
	10 years of experience in internal auditing or related field, with 5 in the insurance sector.
	ICAN or CIIA certification
	Experience in internal auditing
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, and ability to communicate audit findings to non-audit stakeholders.



	
	


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: bola@changeroom.ng or augustina@changeroom.ng or info.changeroom@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Marketing / Sales Officer Job at Proten International
content:
Proten International is a leading international Human Resource and Management Consulting firm which provides a range of Advisory and Transformation solutions. Our focus is to align every organisation’s activities relating to People, Process and Technology closely with its business strategy and vision.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing / Sales Officer
Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are recruiting for a Marketing/Sales Officer for our client in the polymer/plastic industry in Port Harcourt.
	This is a fantastic opportunity for a driven professional with hands-on experience in polymer sales, industrial marketing, or B2B commercial roles. Preferred candidate must have experience in at least one of the aforementioned areas.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage customer accounts and ensure seamless delivery and after-sales support
	Drive new business development across sectors like packaging, blow molding, and injection molding
	Conduct market visits and gather intelligence on trends, customer needs, and competition
	Support demand planning, product promotions, and customer events
	Collaborate cross-functionally with technical, logistics, and supply chain teams


Qualifications


	Bachelor's in Marketing, Business Admin, Chemical Engineering, Industrial Chemistry, or related fields
	2–4 years of relevant experience
	Proficient in MS Excel & PowerPoint
	Strong communication, analytical, and interpersonal skills
	Must be self-driven and open to frequent travel
	Familiarity with the packaging or plastics manufacturing sector is a strong advantage.
